programme.title: Assassino Virtual, (1995, Action)

programme.title: Fbrica de Loucuras, (1986, Comedy)

programme.title: A rvore Da Vida, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: A histria de uma famlia em Waco, Texas, em 1956. O filho mais velho testemunha a perda da inocncia e luta com os ensinamentos conflitantes de seus pais.

programme.title: Uma Esperana de Natal, (2020, Children)
programme.desc: Sem ter onde morar, Rose, uma me solteira, e sua filha Katy redescobrem a esperana ao chegarem a um restaurante em uma pequena cidade.

programme.title: O Melhor Ladro do Mundo, (2005, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Depois que o marido tem um derrame, Sue Zaidman passa a ser a nica provedora de sua famlia. Ela enfrenta uma fase difcil e turbulenta, e tem que se impor para lidar com os filhos e manter-se firme apesar das adversidades.

programme.title: Poder Alm da Vida, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Dan Millman um atleta que tem dinheiro, mulheres perseguindo-o e aptides para participar das Olimpadas. Mas um encontro com Scrates, um homem que questiona tudo, faz sua viso de mundo mudar completamente.

programme.title: ltimos Dias no Deserto, (2015, Drama)

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O Passado No Perdoa, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A famlia Zachary uma famlia rica e influente do Texas, comandada por Ben e sua me, alm dos outros trs filhos, dois meninos e Rachel, que adotada.

programme.title: A ltima Viagem, (2019, Dramedy)

programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de trfico sexual.

programme.desc: Aps os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de gua na Terra, uma nave enviada at Tit, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a misso de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: Refgio do Silncio, (2016, Thriller)

programme.title: O Semideus, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a histria aterrorizante do local. No demora at que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: Foras do Mal, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histrias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rdio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: Ataque do Tubaro Mutante, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Um tubaro gigante afunda um barco-escola em alto-mar. Sobreviventes do bizarro desastre refugiam-se em um atol, mas quando a mar comea a subir, o tubaro mutante de duas cabeas ressurge e ningum est a salvo da fera voraz.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: Enquanto o mundo tomado por zumbis, um grupo de cientistas e militares abrigados em um bunker subterrneo na Flrida devem determinar como devem lidar com a horda de mortos-vivos e com as diferenas entre os sobreviventes.

programme.title: O Monstro dentro de voc, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Depois de uma noite de festa Lou se levanta com sintomas desagradveis que indicam que algo est errado. Seu corpo muda pouco a pouco de uma maneira estranha, h manchas em sua pele e ele tem vises que a impedem de distinguir a realidade da fico.

programme.title: V/H/S - Viral, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Em busca da fama na internet, um grupo de adolescentes comea a filmar fenmenos estranhos. Mas eles no sabem que s conseguiro a ateno desejada quando forem protagonistas de acontecimentos sobrenaturais e sangrentos.

programme.title: Direto das Profundezas, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Depois de sobreviver a um ataque de tubaro, uma jovem atormentada por pesadelos de ser perseguida no mar escuro por um predador faminto e alucinaes de visitas de sua irm e parceiro, ambos mortos no ataque.

programme.title: O Trevo Vermelho, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Um duende malvado que foi aprisionado nas razes de um velho carvalho acidentalmente solto no Dia de So Patrcio. Uma vez livre, ele realiza sua vingana sangrenta contra as pessoas que originalmente o aprisionaram.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubaro de 6 Cabeas, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivncia quando um tubaro de 6 cabeas comea a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contgio, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalao aps a liberao de uma bactria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituio psiquitrica encontra um velho tubo de vcuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactrias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: Busca de Vingana, (2015, Thriller)

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua arrive in a village in East Gorteau but find no trace of the inhabitants.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter

programme.title: Drive, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Hollywood stunt performer (Ryan Gosling) who moonlights as a wheelman discovers that a contract has been put on him after a heist gone wrong.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York, (2003, Drama)
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's epic film set in mid-19th century Lower Manhattan tells the story of a young Irish immigrant (Leonardo DiCaprio) seeking revenge against the rival gang leader who killed his father.

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: A drug lord who pretends to overthrow the Mexican government. A corrupt FBI agent (Johnny Depp) who at that time, demands retribution from his worst enemy to carry out the drug lord's uprising against the government.

programme.title: Proud Mary, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Taraji P. Henson is Mary, a hit woman working for an organized crime family in Boston, whose life is completely turned around when she meets a young boy whose path she crosses when a professional hit goes bad.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York, (2003, Drama)
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's epic film set in mid-19th century Lower Manhattan tells the story of a young Irish immigrant (Leonardo DiCaprio) seeking revenge against the rival gang leader who killed his father.

programme.title: Snatch, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A diamond heist gone haywire launches gangsters, bookies, and a dog on a rollicking ride through the rugged world of bare-knuckle boxing in search of the missing stone. Critically acclaimed comedy from Guy Richie.

programme.title: Drive, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Hollywood stunt performer (Ryan Gosling) who moonlights as a wheelman discovers that a contract has been put on him after a heist gone wrong.

programme.title: A Most Violent Year, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: In 1981 NYC, an immigrant (Oscar Isaac) and his family try to expand their business as rampant violence and corruption drag them in and threaten to destroy all they have built.

programme.title: Obvious Child, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: A one night stand leaves a woman (Jenny Slate) with an unexpected surprise just in time for Valentine's Day in this hilarious and heartwarming romantic comedy that has critics audiences raving.

programme.title: The Spectacular Now, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Effortless charmer Sutter Keely (Miles Teller) unexpectedly falls for "good girl" Aimee Finnicky (Shailene Woodley) in this authentic and charming portrait about the perilous business of young love and growing up.

programme.title: While We're Young, (2015, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Josh and Cornelia, happily married middle-aged creatives in NYC, have given up on starting a family. When they meet a free-spirited young couple, Josh and Cornelia throw aside friends their own age to trail after the uninhibited hipsters.

programme.title: Swiss Army Man, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: Hank (Paul Dano) is stranded on a deserted island and given up all hope. Everything changes when a corpse (Daniel Radcliffe) washes ashore. They become fast friends and go on an epic adventure to bring Hank back to the woman of his dreams.

programme.title: Dream Scenario, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: A hapless family man (Nicolas Cage) finds his life turned upside down when millions of strangers suddenly see him in their dreams and his newfound stardom takes a nightmarish turn. A wickedly entertaining comedy from producer Ari Aster.

programme.title: Hoop Dreams, (1994, Documentary)
programme.desc: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

programme.title: When We Were Kings, (1997, Documentary)
programme.desc: A documentary of the 1974 heavyweight championship bout in Zaire, 'The Rumble in the Jungle,' between champion George Foreman and underdog challenger Muhammad Ali.

programme.title: Tigerland, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: As a nation stands divided over the war in Vietnam, stark differences of opinion surface among the men of A-Company, triggering unexpected and far-reaching consequences.

programme.title: Blue Chips, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: Pete Bell, a college basketball coach is under a lot of pressure. His team isn't winning. The stars of the future are being paid by other teams. This practise is forbidden in the college game, but Pete is desperate and has pressures from all around.

programme.title: Major League II, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: The Indians are now a World Series contender. But last year's hunger is now replaced with complacency, and bad decisions by the new owner threaten to tear the team apart.

programme.title: Major League: Back to the Minors, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Minor league pitcher Gus Cantrell is given the opportunity to manage the South Carolina Buzz. The ailing baseball team is full of a wacky lineup of terrible players, but owner Roger Dorn is banking on Cantrell to make a top-notch franchise out of them.

programme.title: Varsity Blues, (1999, Drama)
programme.desc: At first, backup quarterback Jonathan is no football star. But when the starting quarterback is injured, he is thrown into the game but also in direct conflict with his coach and girlfriend.

programme.title: Harold and Maude, (1971, Comedy)
programme.desc: A classic cult film that features one of the screen's most unlikely pairs. It will defy everything you've ever seen or known about screen lovers.

programme.desc: Woody Allen invades the spirit of Tolstoy in this hilarious spoof of 18th Century Russia, when Napoleon is preoccupied with perfecting his pastry and before Wellington markets his beef.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Comedy)

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.desc: A country boy and Vietnam draftee embark on an adventure of a lifetime when he meets a group of counterculture hippies and his eyes are opened to the darker side of class, race, and big city life in this adaptation of the Broadway sensation.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster, The Winged Dragon of Ra, targeted to annihilate the rest of Joey's Life Points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it's a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing Life Points equals losing your memories.
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 1: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Mai loses more memories under Marik's relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends' never-ending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 2: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik's The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she's unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities. Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 3: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City finals, Kaiba's mystery opponent is Ishizu. With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play.
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 1: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Luffy makes Caesar pay for his crimes against the children, and Smoker risks his life for a chance to see Vergo fall in battle!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Surprising Outcome! White Chase vs. Vergo!

programme.title: Law reaches the end of his epic battle with Vergo, and Luffy looks to land a devastating final blow on the murderous gasbag Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Caesar's Defeat! The Powerful Grizzly Magnum!

programme.title: Word of Luffy and Law's alliance spreads throughout the world, Chopper and Brook race to stay ahead of the deadly gas, and Joker sends a team to rescue Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The laboratory crumbling around them, and time running out, Luffy, the Straw Hats, the G-5, the children and all the others make a final desperate sprint towards the one exit left off the island - but Joker has one more trick up his sleeve.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: As the Straw Hats and company flee the crumbling laboratory, Caesar's desperate act of vengeance thwarts Joker's plan to forever silence his enemies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Critical Situation! Punk Hazard Explodes!

programme.title: Franky continues his battle with Buffalo and Baby 5, Nami uses a mighty gust of wind to save the children from a deadly cloud of gas, and Usopp takes a shot at capturing Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A dragon regains his boyish form, a noble warrior once feared dead makes a shocking resurrection, and bitter enemies set aside their differences to enjoy a well-deserved feast!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Touching Reunion! Momonosuke and Kin'emon!

programme.title: The weary marines and the rescued children get teary-eyed as they say goodbye to the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Law enters into treacherous negotiations with Joker!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It's Time to Say Goodbye! Leaving Punk Hazard!

programme.title: On their way after having set out from Punk Hazard, the Straw Hats find out their next destination - just as a huge wave comes crashing down on the Sunny! But it's rough sailing for the G-5 as well, as Donflamingo arrives on the scene and wreaks havoc!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The G-5 Wiped Out! Doflamingo's Sudden Attack!

programme.title: Aokiji's intercession saves Smoker and sends Joker off to rethink his strategy, leaving unanswered questions about Aokiji's current status. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats catch their breath as the Sunny makes its way through the rough seas of the New World.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Smooth seas stretch out before the Straw Hats as they leave Punk Hazard far behind -- but while they fear Donflamingo's return and prepare to face him, another foe lies in wait, whose powers could be their downfall!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Caesar Goes Missing! The Pirate Alliance Makes a Sortie!

programme.title: Breed has Luffy, Trafalgar, and Chopper firmly in his grasp with his Peto-Peto power! Breed dreams of a world in which he has enslaved all the humans, but Luffy's stubborn persistence and unwillingness to cooperate may have landed him in hot water.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Dies at Sea?! The Pirate Alliance Comes Apart!

programme.title: Dressrosa! Luffy and the Straw Hats divide into teams and set about their business on this passionate, enchanting island! But here, in the heart of enemy territory, danger lurks around every corner. Luffy and the others encounter a mysterious blind man.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explore! A Kingdom of Love and Passion - Dressrosa!

programme.title: Out and about in Dressrosa, Luffy and his team encounter a mysterious and powerful blind gambler - and run into trouble while his shocking powers distract everyone! Meanwhile, a major event in the Colosseum draws huge crowds.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Full of Enthusiasm! The Corrida Colosseum!

programme.title: Zoro, Sanji, and Kin'emon strike off in search of the thieving fairy who has taken Zoro's sword, but Sanji finds himself mesmerized by the beautiful dancing of a gorgeous Dressrosa woman - with a deadly secret!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Dangerous Love! The Dancer Girl - Violet!

programme.title: Luffy enters the Corrida Colosseum in order to compete for Ace's Flare-Flare Fruit! But with the mightiest warriors of the New World assembled and standing in his way, the competition will not be easy. The first stage of the competition is a battle royal.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Formidable, Unknown Warrior! Here Comes Lucy!

programme.title: While the deadly battle of Block A winds down, all the onlookers in the stadium are shocked to discover the secret identity of the winner! Meanwhile, Luffy's cover may be blown as another voice from the past returns.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy meets an unexpected acquaintance from the past, Bellamy, who seems to be up to no good! Meanwhile, Caesar Handover Team encounters a snag when they learn just how dangerous Green Bit is!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fateful Reunion! Bellamy the Hyena!

programme.title: The battle heats up and the widely despised Bartolomeo takes the ring! But he'll have to contend with both the Prodence Kingdom contingent, and Dressrosa's own local favorite, Bellamy! From up above, Luffy risks having his cover blown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Super Rookie! Bartolomeo the Cannibal!

programme.title: Don Chinjao continues to provoke Luffy, hoping to gain revenge against the grandson of his sworn enemy, Garp! But as the argument continues, Luffy risks having his cover blown, and his identity revealed! Meanwhile, the battle in Block B rages.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big Names Duke It Out! The Heated Block B Battle!

programme.title: The battle for Block B hits a crescendo as King Elizabello II prepares his devastating King Punch! But as the powerful attack becomes imminent, the Prodence Kingdom faction unravels! All that may be pointless, though.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Blow! The Astonishing King Punch!

programme.title: As the handover team approaches Green Bit, they are attacked by the fearsome fish that live off the coast of Dressrosa. But that's the least of their problems as they find the bridge to Green Bit has collapsed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fighting Fish Strike! Across the Deadly Iron Bridge!

programme.title: Zoro tracks the thief who stole his sword - and learns about a danger facing the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Law, Usopp, and the others arrive at Green Bit only to find it inhabited by strange creatures, and swarming with the Navy soldiers!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: All but done for, Sanji is trapped by Violet and her crew when she suddenly changes her mind and mysteriously turns on her own men! Meanwhile, Robin and Usopp come face to face with the Little People known as the Tontatta Tribe.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Unknown World! The Tontatta Kingdom!

programme.title: Sanji gets in touch with Law in order to share a shocking secret - that could unsettle the Straw Hats' plans in Dressrosa for good! Meanwhile, Luffy's Block C battle begins, but will his Gum-Gum powers give him away?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Stratagem of the Century! Doflamingo Makes His Move!

programme.title: Sanji and Franky try to regroup after Doflamingo's betrayal, hoping that destroying the factory is not yet out of their grasp. Meanwhile Luffy makes a friend in the Colosseum and Usopp ends up thrust into an uncomfortable position!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shaking Heaven and Earth! Admiral Fujitora's Power!

programme.title: The Sunny is mysteriously deformed by the bizarre powers of Giolla! Can Nami, Chopper, and Brook act in time to save their beloved home? Meanwhile, the battle for Block C continues as Luffy suffers a staggering setback.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Blow of Anger! A Giant vs. Lucy!

programme.title: After knocking down the Giant, Hajrudin, as payback for what he did to Ucy, Luffy has to deal with Ideo, whose punch has the destructive force of a bomb, while the Funk Brothers show off their bizarre fighting technique.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Destruction Cannon Blasts! Lucy in Trouble!

programme.title: Nami, Chopper, and Brooke keep trying to evade Jora and win back the Sunny even though it's been turned into a piece of art! In the Colosseum, Don Chin Jao finally faces Luffy - whose power will prove greater?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legendary Pirate! Don Chin Jao!

programme.title: Luffy stands along against Don Chinjao, and learns about the old grudge he bears against Garp! Meanwhile, Usopp and Robin get swept up in the Tontatta Kingdom's raid against the royal family, and Franky learns the eerie secret of Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Light and Shadow! Darkness behind Dressrosa!

programme.title: The Tontatta Kingdom gears up for its all-out assault on the Doflamingo Family, as Usopp and Robin are caught up in the war effort! Meanwhile, Franky arrives the headquarters of the toy movement where he finds Zoro, Nami & the others are cornered by Jora.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Making a Sortie! The Legendary Hero Usoland!

programme.title: Don Chin Jao's hatred of Garp and Luffy is finally explained, while his battle against Luffy comes to an end. With tremendous power, one of them is squarely eliminated! But is that really the end of the Colosseum battle?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fierce Battle Coming to the End! Lucy vs. Chin Jao!

programme.title: With the battle with Don Chinjao long behind him, Luffy advances to the final round! Block-D contender Cavendish, however, takes the chance and pounces on Luffy, who is defended by an unlikely ally! The agenda of Colosseum gladiator Rebecca is exposed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy and the Gladiator of Fate - Rebecca!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love
programme.desc: Ultimate thief Lupin III has a new target: the lost gold of the Romanov dynasty! With the help of a mysterious blonde named Judy Scott, Lupin discovers the treasure hidden in Texas, at the Bank of Liberty.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's been a long time since Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko have heard from Lupin. Then one day, they each receive an invitation from Lupin for a reunion aboard the luxury liner Sirloin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An international soccer game is taking place in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil and Lupin has his eyes on the box office and betting takes. Will the box office heist go as planned?
programme.sub-title: Wads of Bills Blossomed in the Sunset of Rio

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An old man who supposedly knows the secret to Hitler's legacy lives in East Germany within the Berlin Wall. Lupin and his gang track the old man down, but the old man can't recall anything about any legacy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: At Loch Ness in Scotland, the mysterious monster Nessie reveals itself from the lake, charmed by Fujiko's singing. Seeing this, Doctor Oz decides to use Fujiko to capture Nessie for his personal gain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko and a mystery man have an enticing job for Lupin: Stealing a ton of gold bullion from a Swiss Bank, a bank renowned for its tight security. Can it be done? What is the mystery man's true identity?
programme.sub-title: I'll Teach You How to Transport Gold Bars

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A man is threatening to destroy the Leaning Tower of Pisa with a device that generates artificial earthquakes. The Italian government has no choice but to meet the culprit's, but Lupin takes the ransom for himself!
programme.sub-title: Will the Leaving Tower of Pisa Be Standing?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the golden death mask of Tutankhamen, the ancient Egyptian pharaoh known as the "boy king." However, when Lupin tries on the golden death mask he becomes possessed by an ominous curse.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Trans Europe Superexpress train has departed Venice and is headed to France. Onboard the Superexpress is crime boss Don Marcino's ill-gotten treasures. Can Lupin and his gang pull off the heist before the train reaches its destination?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin meets the grandson of master Ukiyoe artist, Toushusai Sharaku and learns that he has been switching his own works with his grandfather's originals. Unable to switch the last painting due to illness, he asks Lupin to switch it in his stead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko have been invited to a party hosted by Marcel Dulane, a member of Paris' high society. However, the elegant party turns out to be a trap. Fujiko is taken hostage and Lupin, with a time-bomb belt strapped to his waist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Monaco to race his new toy in the Monaco Grand Prix. Or so he thought. Lupin ends up losing both his money and race car in a fixed poker game at the casino.
programme.sub-title: Bet on the Monaco Grand Prix!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A rare bottle of Bordeaux, commissioned by Napoleon for his beloved wife, Josephine, is to be given to the President of the United States as a Christmas present.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A criminal gang has hidden a microfilm containing the manufacturing process for artificial diamonds, developed by NASA, in one of Inspector Zenigata's molars. Determined to get his hands on that microfilm, Lupin must capture Inspector Zenigata.
programme.sub-title: The Great Chase in San Francisco

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Forward Hees, the world's richest man, suddenly dies a mysterious death and leaves a large ruby to Fujiko in his will. After inheriting the ruby, Fujiko comes down with the same mysterious fever as Hees
programme.sub-title: Big Adventure of the Caribbean Sea

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A Count challenges Lupin to steal a gemstone named Dracula's Tear from on board his airship, the Hendenburg. However, also on board the ship are several formidable detectives: Homes III, Detective Archer, Koojisuke Kaneda and Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is suffering from Transformation Sickness, an illness that transforms him into a cruel, cold-blooded criminal at the stroke of midnight, and leaves him with no recollection of his murderous crime spree in the morning

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A small Arab nation has received a blackmail notice. Pay a $100 million or have their oil fields blown up. Lupin targets the money, but his plans are hindered when he finds out the culprits are using human bombs.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Black Panther, the world's largest emerald, gets its name from the black panther that appears inside it when a light shines on it at a particular angle. After capturing this one-of-a-kind emerald, Lupin hides it in a museum to retrieve it later

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vault maker Marukin Safe Company is forced into bankruptcy after Lupin cracks open their impenetrable safes. To test his own skills, Marukin's son challenges Lupin to open a safe he has designed

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: While trying to snag General Hatler's prize medallion, which contains a fifty-carat ruby, Lupin inadvertently reels in Hatler's biggest secret, his toupee! An enraged General Hatler orders Lupin and his gang to be killed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Upon returning to Japan, Goemon finds his master on the brink of death. Furthermore, Jinkuro, a fellow disciple, had stolen half of the scroll containing the Secret Arts of the Iga Ninja. Will Goemon be able to avenge his master?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are in a remote area pursing a mysterious treasure, when they save a woman being chased by hoodlums. The woman invites the two back to her sister's manor, which is full of beautiful women

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A mysterious woman who claims to be Fujiko's aunt, gives Lupin an ultimatum: Find Marshal Rommel's lost gold or die! First, Lupin must decipher the location of the gold, written in ancient hieroglyphs.
programme.sub-title: A Witch in the Fourth Dimension

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The great thief Nezumi-Kozou Jirokichi IV appears before Goemon and reveals that their ancestors competed in the first International Thieves Championship together, but were defeated by Lupin's grandfather, Arsne Lupin
programme.sub-title: The Phantom Thief Rat Boy Appears

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The warden of an African prison is holding Fujiko captive. Lupin and his gang infiltrate the prison and attempt to break Fujiko out, but they become the target of the Iron Lizards, robotic devices developed to chase down fugitives!

programme.title: Escape Plan 2: Hades, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Years after he fought his way out of prison, Ray Breslin must return to the hell he once escaped from to save his friend from the prisons brutal human battleground, known as Hades.

programme.title: Escape Plan 3: The Extractors, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive action saga, Sylvester Stallone, Curtis Jackson, and Dave Bautista play security experts who fight to rescue Breslins girlfriend and a tech moguls daughter from a formidable prison known as Devils Station.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: Escape Plan, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone, Arnold Schwarzenegger, and 50 Cent star as inmates who must break out of a top secret, high-security prison in this non-stop action-thriller.

programme.title: Escape Plan 2: Hades, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Years after he fought his way out of prison, Ray Breslin must return to the hell he once escaped from to save his friend from the prisons brutal human battleground, known as Hades.

programme.title: Escape Plan 3: The Extractors, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive action saga, Sylvester Stallone, Curtis Jackson, and Dave Bautista play security experts who fight to rescue Breslins girlfriend and a tech moguls daughter from a formidable prison known as Devils Station.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: District 9, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly find a kindred spirit in a government agent that is exposed to their biotechnology.

programme.title: Canadian Pacific, (1949, Drama)
programme.desc: A surveyor for the Canadian Pacific Railroad must fight fur trappers who oppose the building of the railroad by stirring up Indian rebellion.

programme.title: The Iron Sheriff, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Sterling Hayden plays a sheriff with continuing moral dilemmas. Should he relate a deathbed confession which falsely implicates his son in a murder? Should he carry out his threat to cold-bloodedly kill the real murderer or bring him to legal justice?

programme.title: Fort Massacre, (1958, Drama)
programme.desc: Joel McCrea gives a compelling performance as a cavalry sergeant apparently leading his men to safety, but actually slowly going mad in an insane attempt to avenge an Indian massacre.

programme.title: Billy Two Hats, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: Archie (Gregory Peck) and his partner, Billy (Desi Arnaz, Jr.) are bandits by trade, staging daring robberies throughout the American frontier. But when their latest heist takes a deadly turn, they are pursued by a ruthless marshal (Jack Warden).

programme.title: Gunsight Ridge, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Stage line agent investigates a series of robberies by taking the job of a deputy sheriff in a border Arizona town.

programme.title: The Halliday Brand, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: A western about a young man's (Joseph Cotten) disillusionment with his father (Ward Bond), a corrupt sheriff. When his dad turns away from the lynching of his sister's lover, the boy rebels and his father declares him an 'outlaw.'

programme.title: The Broken Star, (1956, Drama)
programme.desc: A marshal murders a rancher for gold, but is foiled by his assistant.

programme.title: Warlock, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: An ex-outlaw (Richard Widmark) divides and challenges a quick-draw lawman (Henry Fonda) and his sidekick (Anthony Quinn).

programme.title: The Tin Star, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Ben Owens, a greenhorn sheriff who hasnt worn his badge long... and wont live to wear it much longer unless he gets some savvy help.

programme.title: The Gunfighter, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: A retired gunslinger is forced to strap on his six-shooters once again by the vengeful brothers of a man he killed in self-defense.

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: From Academy Award-winning director Clint Eastwood and Academy Award-winner Steven Spielberg, comes the life stories of the six men who raised the flag at The Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in WWII.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Changing Lanes, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: Late for court, an attorney weaves in and out of traffic. In a different lane, a father whose right to see his children rests on getting to court on time. A minor accident will turn these two strangers into beasts.

programme.desc: A former Army Ranger, now working as a DEA agent, is called in to investigate the disappearance of a drill sergeant and several cadets during a training mission that went disastrously wrong in the Panamanian jungle.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is shocked to find out that shes gained weight from too much eating. Determined to get back into shape, Usagi and her friends join a gym.
programme.sub-title: Learn How to Be Skinny from Usagi

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shingo brings home a pet Chanela. Shingo becomes so absorbed in the Chanela that he stops going to school, which worries Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Scent of a Monster: Chanela Will Steal Your Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi bumps into Yusuke Amade, a famous musician who claims he is being chased by a monster. Usagi and Luna decide to keep an eye on Yusuke.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Melody of Love: Usagi Plays Cupid

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Naru dream of becoming famous like Mikan Shiratori. When the girls hear that Mikan is hosting a talent contest, they see their chance.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Learns Her Lesson: Becoming a Star Is Hard Work

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi befriends Ami Mizuno, the schools smartest girl. But Luna, who senses an unknown energy coming from Ami, suspects her of being a Monster.
programme.sub-title: The Girl Genius Is a Monster: The Brainwashing Cram School of Horror

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Ami find a clock that resembles Luna. That night, the clock emits a strange light that causes Usagi to become very impatient.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Disaster: Beware of the Clock of Confusion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: People who take the bus near the Hikawa Shrine have started to go missing. Usagi and her friends decide to investigate.
programme.sub-title: The Cursed Bus: Enter Mars, the Guardian of Fire

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians go to the amusement park where visitors have gone missing. But Usagi is more focused on playing than finding the missing people.
programme.sub-title: Usagi vs. Rei: Nightmare in Dream Land

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei goes off on a luxury cruise with Ami after winning tickets through the local lottery. Feeling left behind, Usagi sneaks aboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: I Want a Boyfriend: The Luxury Cruise Ship is a Trap

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Jadeite is given a warning by Queen Beryl, who can no longer tolerate the generals failures. Jadeite challenges the Sailor Guardians to a showdown.
programme.sub-title: Girls Unite: The End of Jadeite

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rui is a talented tennis player but Naru has noticed a dark change in her. Worried about their classmate, Naru and Usagi go to investigate.
programme.sub-title: A New Enemy Appears: Nephrite's Evil Crest

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami brings Usagi and Rei to her favorite park. Rei decides to have a date with Mamoru at the park before it closes down.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Juban District is having a contest to decide who can design the best wedding dress. Usagi, Rei, and all the girls in town compete.
programme.sub-title: A Girl's Dream: Usagi Becomes a Bride

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A photographer named Kijin Shinokawa holds a modeling contest. All the girls who have entered begin disappearing after Shinokawa photographs them!
programme.sub-title: Usagi's a Model: The Flash of the Monster Camera

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shingos friend Mika gives him a doll but Shingo unintentionally breaks the doll and hurts Mikas feelings. Shingo decides to apologize.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi receives a love letter from Tuxedo Mask, stating that hed like to meet her. She finds out that all the girls in town received the same letter.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Joy: A Love Letter from Tuxedo Mask

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls search for a vacation spot so they can focus on training. Instead, they settle on a mansion that has a very eerie service staff.
programme.sub-title: The Summer, the Beach, Youth and Ghosts

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami spots Nephrite and follows him to an animation studio that is making the Sailor V movie. Ami calls Usagi and Rei so they can investigate.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Children's Dreams: Friendship Through Anime

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Diamonds is hosting a party to reveal their treasure to the world. Both the Sailor Guardians and the Dark Kingdom crash the party.
programme.sub-title: Romance Under the Moon: Usagi's First Kiss

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Naru has fallen in love with Masato Sanjoin. Knowing that Sanjoin is really Nephrite, Usagi tries to convince Naru to give up on her feelings.
programme.sub-title: Wish upon a Star: Naru's First Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nephrite uncovers Sailor Moons identity as Usagi. His attempt to finish her off is cut short when he learns that Naru has been kidnapped by Zoisite.
programme.sub-title: Naru's Tears: Nephrite Dies for Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A new girl named Makoto Kino transfers to Usagis school, but her tough attitude seems to scare everyone away. Usagi quickly becomes friends with her.
programme.sub-title: Jupiter, the Powerful Girl in Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians grow in strength with its newest member Sailor Jupiter joining the team. Sailor Moon is appointed as team leader.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi learns that a transfer student named Ryo Urawa seems to have a crush on Ami, and tries to help him out.
programme.sub-title: Crushing on Ami: The Boy Who Can See the Future

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Naru attend an art exhibit by Yumemi Yumeno. Usagi and Mamoru are both asked by Yumemi to become models for her latest painting.
programme.sub-title: The Painting of Love: Usagi and Mamoru Get Closer

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Makoto discover Motoki has a girlfriend named Reika. His relationship is in jeopardy due to Reikas chance to study abroad.
programme.sub-title: Total Chaos: The Messy Love Rectangle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Grandpa Hino has become emotionally unstable, causing Rei to worry. The new apprentice Yuichiro tries to cheer her up.
programme.sub-title: Grandpa Loses Control: Rei in Danger

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and friends meet a girl who they believe holds the final Rainbow Crystal. But they realize its her pet cat that possesses the Rainbow Crystal!
programme.sub-title: Loved and Chased: Luna's Worst Day Ever

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Umino seems to have fallen in love with Naru. Naru only considers Umino a friend, so Usagi decides to play Cupid and urges them to go on a date.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: When the exploits of a Sailor Moon imposter become quite the sensation, the real Sailor Guardians step in to investigate.
programme.sub-title: Enter Venus, the Last Sailor Guardian

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Now that Sailor Venus has joined the team, all of the Sailor Guardians are finally together! Zoisite has discovered that Tuxedo Mask is Mamoru Chiba.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Silver Crystal: The Moon Princess Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tuxedo Mask is wounded while protecting Sailor Moon. The seven Rainbow Crystals gather and she is transformed into Serenity.
programme.sub-title: Returning Memories: Usagi and Mamoru's Past

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is haunted by dreams of Tuxedo Mask, who has been abducted by the Dark Kingdom. Minako takes Usagi to a popular hair salon hoping it will help.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Confusion: Is Tuxedo Mask Evil?

programme.title: Episode

programme.title: Blitz

programme.title: Ninja
programme.desc: Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: O Despertar
programme.desc: Selene, que descobre que tem um filha adolescente chamada Lycan, uma hbrida de vampiro e humano. Juntas, elas devem impedir a empresa biotecnolgica Antigen de produzir as criaturas conhecidas como SuperLycans.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: O Grande Dave
programme.desc: Tripulao de aliens em miniatura opera uma nave espacial com forma humana.

programme.title: Conduo Perigosa

programme.desc: A polcia prende um psicopata que est ligado a vrios sequestros e assassinatos de mulheres, mas sua captura ser apenas o incio de uma contagem regressiva em busca de suas vtimas.

programme.title: Cdigo de Honra
programme.desc: Um ex-coronel das foras especiais se torna um vigilante que mata criminosos, enquanto um ex-colega quer det-lo.

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingana Explosiva
programme.desc: Ruslan Drachev um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experincias. Ao visitar sua famlia ele descobre que sua filha est casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime.

programme.title: Kite - Anjo da Vingana
programme.desc: Sawa perde o pai policial e a me, vtimas de um macabro duplo homicdio. Com a ajuda do parceirode seu pai, Karl Aker, e uma misteriosa amiga de seu passado Sawa comea uma perseguio implacvel em busca de quem os matou.

programme.desc: Aaron Hallam um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vtimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland.

programme.title: A Casa Amaldioada
programme.desc: Neste suspense sobrenatural de tirar o flego com as maiores estrela de Hollywood, um estudo sobre o medo vira um pesadelo para um professor e seus trs objetos de estudos presos em uma misteriosa manso.

programme.title: Halloween: O Incio
programme.desc: Depois de 17 anos internado, Michael Myers, agora um homem adulto e ainda muito perigoso, escapa da instituio mental e imediatamente retorna a Haddonfield para encontrar sua irm mais nova.

programme.title: O Grito 2

programme.title: O Principal Suspeito

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 4

programme.title: Av Psictica
programme.desc: Melissa, uma mulher casada e feliz com uma filha de oito anos, convida a sogra para morar com eles. No entanto, ela percebe que a av est perturbada e quer sequestrar a menina para substituir seu prprio filho morto.

programme.title: Obsesso Perigosa

programme.desc: Um chefo da mfia se vinga do policial responsvel pela morte de seu filho durante um assalto a banco. O policial ento libera sua fria em retaliao pela morte de sua famlia.

programme.title: Ameaa no Espao
programme.desc: Na iminncia da paternidade, um mecnico jnior a bordo de uma arca interestelar para a Nova Terra precisa enganar um terror csmico malvolo que pretende usar a espaonave como arma.

programme.title: Python Monstro
programme.desc: Uma equipe de filmagem filmando em uma vila abandonada usa uma coleo de ovos grandes que encontram como adereos para seu filme. Apenas para descobrir que a me dos ovos mataria para recuper-los.

programme.desc: Num futuro incerto, a raa humana foi quase totalmente devastada da Terra. Para salvar o mundo, os governantes decidiram criar uma droga capaz de inibir o sentimento humano e garantir a paz para sempre.

programme.desc: A saga continua mostrando o incio da antiga disputa entre as duas triboso os Vampiros y Lycans, enquanto a bela herona vampira Selene descobre que foi trada pela sua prpria raa e agora precisa buscar vingana.

programme.desc: Em um futuro onde as pessoas param de envelhecer aos 25 anos, o dinheiro pode comprar juventude imortal. Will Salas acusado de assassinato e foge com um refm que talvez possa quebrar o sistema.

programme.title: Rastros de um Crime
programme.desc: Um limpador de casas envolve-se num crime violento aps ter sido contratado para localizar o filho de um cliente.

programme.desc: Uma especialista em desarmar bombas est presa em seu prprio carro junto de seu filho e a namorada dele - uma mina foi instalada no veculo e ela ser detonada em 30 minutos. Agora, um jogo de tenso e pacincia tem incio..

programme.desc: Este confronto clssico entre o bem e o mal estrelado por Kevin Costner , Robert De Niro e Sean Connery , o policial que ensina Ness a vencer a multido: atirar rpido e atirar primeiro.

programme.title: Pegadas na neve
programme.desc: O perigo ronda uma montanha de neve. Cinco pessoas exploram uma regio nos alpes em busca de uma planta com propriedades medicinais.

programme.desc: Histria verdica sobre o jogo de gato e rato entre o FBI tentando encontrar um espio sovitico em suas fileiras e Robert Hanssen, um dos principais agentes do FBI e o provavel espio.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento - S2E78
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido - S2E79
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras - S2E80
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes - S2E81
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez - S2E82
programme.desc: O desejo de Sasuke por vingana continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses at sua transferncia. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Alvo Na Mira! - S2E83

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo! - S2E87

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Preo Do Poder - S2E89

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Encontro - S2E92

programme.title: The Last Gunfight (2025)
programme.desc: As the worlds top assassins fight to the death in a ruthless underground tournament, a rogue crew has its own deadly agenda: survive the carnage, outplay the killers and take down the mastermind behind it all.

programme.title: The Painter (2024)
programme.desc: An ex-CIA operative is tracked down by a young woman and they become entangled in an unauthorized black ops program.

programme.title: Cloverfield (2008)
programme.desc: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan (1998)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers (2002)
programme.desc: A lieutenant colonel and approximately 400 U.S. troops battle 2,000 North Vietnamese soldiers in 1965.

programme.title: Becky (2020)
programme.desc: Spunky and rebellious Becky tries to reconnect with her father during a weekend getaway at a lakefront house. But the trip soon takes a turn for the worse when convicts on the run, led by the merciless Dominick, suddenly invade the home.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: A mans life collapses when his mistress is found dead in his pool. Terrified of the consequences and desperate to protect his family, he conceals the truth, triggering a chaotic night that threatens to unravel his perfect life.

programme.title: La Madrina: The Savage Life of Lorine Padilla (2020)
programme.sub-title: La Madrina: The Savage Life of Lorine Padilla (2020)
programme.desc: Lorine Padilla joins a street gang in the Bronx, N.Y., before becoming an activist and spiritual adviser.

programme.title: Bitchin: The Sound and Fury of Rick James
programme.desc: A raw and intimate documentary look at the wildly colorful life of legendary funk artist Rick James; original interviews with artists, collaborators and friends.

programme.title: JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass (2021)
programme.sub-title: JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass (2021)
programme.desc: Filmmaker Oliver Stone examines the circumstances surrounding the assassination of President John F. Kennedy on Nov. 22, 1963, in Dallas.

programme.title: Chuck (2016)
programme.desc: Liquor salesman and part-time prizefighter Chuck Wepner gets the chance to take on Muhammad Ali in a highly publicized title fight, launching him to sudden fame.

programme.title: Gasoline Alley (2022)
programme.desc: Set in the underbelly of Los Angeles, a man is drawn into a high-profile triple murder. The two police detectives on his tail soon join him in attempting to uncover an explosive conspiracy.

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers (2006)
programme.desc: Some of the servicemen who raised the U.S. flag on Mount Suribachi during the Battle of Iwo Jima at the end of World War II live to hear of their status as heroes.

programme.title: Enemy at the Gates (2001)
programme.desc: A Nazi sniper (Ed Harris) travels to Stalingrad to find and kill a Russian sharpshooter (Jude Law), the hero of the propaganda campaign of a political officer (Joseph Fiennes).

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate (2019)

programme.title: Joe Dirt (2001)

programme.sub-title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby (2006)

programme.title: Rescue Dawn (2007)
programme.desc: During the Vietnam War, Dieter Dengler (Christian Bale), a U.S. fighter pilot, is shot down over Laos and taken captive by enemy soldiers.

programme.title: Witness (1985)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: The Hunted (2003)
programme.desc: Aided by the FBI, a retired combat-trainer (Tommy Lee Jones) searches for a former student (Benicio del Toro) who is killing civilians in Oregon.

programme.title: Shadowland (2021)
programme.desc: An ex-serviceman is forced to seek refuge for his team and the family in their charge in rural Scotland, with devastating consequences.

programme.title: Prison Fighters: 5 Rounds to Freedom
programme.desc: An examination of a practice in Thailands criminal justice system, where inmates are given the opportunity to earn their freedom through Muay Thai fighting.

programme.title: Nick of Time (1995)
programme.desc: If a recent widower (Johnny Depp) doesnt kill the governor of California within 90 minutes, a kidnapper (Christopher Walken) will kill his daughter.

programme.title: Judgment Night (1993)
programme.desc: On their way to a boxing match, four young men take a wrong turn in Chicago and find danger as witnesses to murder.

programme.title: The Score (2001)
programme.desc: A master thief (Robert De Niro) agrees to work with a volatile partner (Edward Norton) for one last heist before he retires.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects (1995)
programme.desc: A detective (Chazz Palminteri) questions a con man about his relationships with assorted criminals (Stephen Baldwin, Gabriel Byrne) and their link to a ship explosion.
